General.Name: Argo Blockchain PLC
General.Description: Argo Blockchain plc, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies mining business worldwide. It engages in mining purpose-built computers for complex cryptographic algorithms. The company was formerly known as GoSun Blockchain Limited and changed its name to Argo Blockchain plc in December 2017. Argo Blockchain plc was incorporated in 2017 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 16 Great Queen Street, London, United Kingdom, WC2B 5DG

1.Name: Mr. Alex  Appleton C.A.
1.Title: CFO, Principal Financial Officer & Exec. Director
